page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: A survey of why people moved into the Brookmans Park area produced the following results. High on the list of reasons for selecting the Brookmans Park area is the fact that it is connected by train to Moorgate and Kings Cross. The centre of London is only forty to fifty minutes away Another feature which attracts is the fact that Brookmans Park is a pleasant village with adequate shopping facilities.There are also good connecting main roads to the larger towns in the vicinty such as Stevenage and Welwyn Garden City Education is regarded as important to people moving into Brookmans Park and the area has successful primary and secondary schools.
